thread.section_title: RushMyPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushMyPassport.com | rushmypassport.com | 3 of 151
thread.title: L.P.

author: L.P.
title: L.P.
text: I found RushMyPassport online, and saw that they had a high customer satisfaction rating. I decided to give them a look, as my passport had just expired while my attention was directed elsewhere. I found the site well-organized, informative, and easy to navigate. I had a specific question during the application process, and had an immediate response in the chat window. The entire process of renewal went precisely as described on the site, and I even got my new passport three days earlier than I had expected. I was very satisfied with my experience, and would recommend the service.
